message.body: You called it! I fell asleep for a bit. Argh!!!
Lol. As long as you're awake now.
True, if we're being "the glass is half full" type of people hahah. How's your day going?
Not too bad. Been at Hampton all day, just got home.
Sounds like you're alternating between the hotels every day. Must be nice to have a change of scenery.
Yeah, I try to get to each of the hotels. Have work at each of them anyways.
Makes sense. This sucks, I think I'm getting sick.
Aw man, what's wrong?
Have a hint of a sore throat.
Oh man... Need some NyQuil.
I'm just ready to pass out.
Last a couple more hours.
I'm trying. Made tea earlier hoping that the caffeine would kick in.
11is a good time.
We're old :(
We are
It's depressing. I'm sitting on the couch trying to stay warm and thinking about bed. And it's not even midnight. What happened?
Perfect time to sleep!!!
Did you sleep on time? Lol
Not really. Slept at three something, yet I'm still up :)
At least you're up early. That's a good thing.
I know, thanks! How's your morning?
Not bad. Just got to Crowne. Got breakfast. Feeling good.
Getting breakfast food in the morning feels good! It makes you feel like you're getting an ideal start to your day. Well, at least that's how I feel!
Oh my god oh god oh my god!
They got back to me!
Awesome! When is the interview?

Well she emailed to say that they are pleased to inform me that after looking at my credentials, I get a phone interview. She gave me the options of dates I could pick with the time available. I have to let then know when.
She also said how long it should last, what they want to talk about (my background, the company, what they do), and I get to ask questions. All of which I am freaking about about!!!
And you are right, I got a name now.
I'm excited for you! Don't freak out... You'll be fine. Just stay calm and talk about yourself.
I dread that! It feels so narcissistic/arrogant...and to potentially do that for 30 minutes, ehhhhggg.
